mapper.select: SELECT EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_SEQ AS hdaySeq /* 공휴일 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_TYPE_GB AS hdayTypeGb /* 공휴일 유형 GB, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.SHOLIDAY_YY AS sholidayYy /* 대체휴일 년도, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_MMDD AS hdayMmdd /* 공휴일 월일, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.LUNAR_YN AS lunarYn /* 음력 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_NM AS hdayNm /* 공휴일 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_DESC AS hdayDesc /* 공휴일 설명, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_HOLIDAY /* 공휴일 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_SEQ = #{hdaySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 공휴일 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_HOLIDAY /* 공휴일 정보 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_SEQ = #{hdaySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 공휴일 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_DESC LIKE '%' || #{hdayDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 공휴일 설명, VARCHAR2(1000) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_SEQ AS hdaySeq /* 공휴일 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_TYPE_GB AS hdayTypeGb /* 공휴일 유형 GB, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.SHOLIDAY_YY AS sholidayYy /* 대체휴일 년도, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_MMDD AS hdayMmdd /* 공휴일 월일, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.LUNAR_YN AS lunarYn /* 음력 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_NM AS hdayNm /* 공휴일 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_DESC AS hdayDesc /* 공휴일 설명, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_HOLIDAY.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_HOLIDAY /* 공휴일 정보 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_SEQ = #{param.hdaySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 공휴일 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_DESC LIKE '%' || #{param.hdayDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 공휴일 설명, VARCHAR2(1000) */
ORDER BY EZC_HOLIDAY.HDAY_SEQ DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_HOLIDAY SET /* 공휴일 정보 */ HDAY_TYPE_GB = #{hdayTypeGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 공휴일 유형 GB, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,SHOLIDAY_YY = #{sholidayYy, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 대체휴일 년도, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,HDAY_MMDD = #{hdayMmdd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 공휴일 월일, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,LUNAR_YN = #{lunarYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 음력 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,HDAY_NM = #{hdayNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 공휴일 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,HDAY_DESC = #{hdayDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 공휴일 설명, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND HDAY_SEQ = #{hdaySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 공휴일 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_HOLIDAY /* 공휴일 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND HDAY_SEQ = #{hdaySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 공휴일 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
